description:
Look, overal, I love your application. It looks great, it functions well, it's modern. The application itself would be 5 star. Then I decided to check the price if I would want to upgrade to Pro, also to support it and mainly for that and then I got the slap in my face. Are you kidding?! 30 bucks for, well, an essentially note app?! Sorry, but even the horse d.ck has an end!
5 buck...would be fine. 30? Nope, just not worth.
Can't delete folder, once I created them (which is a biggie), not well explained, no direct option to empty the trash. But they do have buttons to "upgrade to pro", so... yeah.
on ne peut pas mettre de photos
